title: Is it true that political power attracts the greediest people? - Quora

response.answer_text: With no moral, or ethical center, all endeavors attract the “greediest” people. Capitalism has no such requirements, neither does the politics we see today. We should have advanced beyond this point long ago. Greed destroys the greedy, and power corrupts the powerful.

I don’t actually know, but I’d say probably not. For the greediest people, there are much better ways to accumulate wealth than political power. My claim would be that political power attracts people who most want to tell others how to live.
